item.title: [TIKA-3424] tika-app in 2.x should log to stderr
item.description: Tika 2.x's app is logging to stdout. We tried to write to stderr via the log4j2.properties file, but that is not being respected.
item.summary: tika-app in 2.x should log to stderr

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

grossws is this related to the problems with logging you saw in tika-server-standard?

It looks like slf4j is picking log4j2 as the binding:

System.err.println(binder.getLoggerFactory());
System.err.println(binder.getLoggerFactoryClassStr());

yields:

Never figured out exact cause. The log4j2.properties file must have been incorrect. This now works with log4j2.xml.
